author: dfs
msg: Fixed description of addElement in response to Bugzilla report 23918

author: dfs
msg: Added a file to keep track of developer PGP keys for release signing and verification.

author: dfs
msg: Removed author tags because almost all of them refer to me, which detracts from community building.  Contributions are listed in the CONTRIBUTORS file.  We can establish and vote on an author tag policy for the project after we restore the necessary committer quorum with the PMC's help.  Removing the tags now just lets us start with a clean slate.

author: dfs
msg: Added missing trailing slash to URL.

author: dfs
msg: Adjusted MatcherDemoApplet references in build.xml and demo.xml to
locate the class in the examples package.
